title: mine colonyMOD合成表 怎么玩之类的 谁教下
author: shchengko
txt_content: 如题，me  minecolony下载好了，安装也安装好了，正要建那个town hall的时候不能弄- -

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
shchengko 发表于 2011-8-16 18:34 
天都知道me都是按安装程序来安装的啊。。。。。。【泪
我自己試著裝一遍, 發現原帖說明文中 
只叫你把 "Put into mods folder" 文件夾中的 "MineColony 0.7rc12.zip" 放到 .minecraft\mods
事實上應該是: 把該文件夾中所有東西都放進去... 
我想用到額外音效, 或許也該再多裝上AudioMod...

照這樣安裝好, 就能放置了...

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-8-16 17:02 编辑 

看官網... 尤其是 QUICK START 那部份
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/385672-v173-minecolony-v07/

看WIKI... 尤其是 Tutorials 那部份
http://minecolony.wikkii.com/wiki/Main_Page

英文不懂... 找網頁翻譯...

Sounds not found in  G:\MinecraftSP\.minecraft//mods//minecolony//town hall cannot be placed

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: sounds？ 声音？ 难道是你声音文件扔错地方了

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
shchengko 发表于 2011-8-18 10:50 
【默

话说又来问题了【继续默
To build a house you need to open the specified chest, go to information tab and click build house causing a sign to appear over the chest. This should cause the builder to start working on hut.

replies.author: shchengko
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-8-18 14:09 
To build a house you need to open the specified chest, go to information tab and click build house ...
已经解决了，谢谢well兄！！！
